snippet.title: NOVECT New Game, Project Code Name “M” Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
NEW NOVECT GAME IN DEVELOPMENT
Project Code Name “M”
Killer and Detective, deduce a serial murder case from both eyes.

From the developers of “The House in Fata Morgana” will come a brand new mystery adventure game set in downtown modern Japan!
You, the player, create murder scenes as a killer, and pursue the truth of serial murder case as a sleuth.

[Title Outline]
Killing and Solving, Detective Adventure Game.
Project Code Name “M”
 * Project name, not official title.
No. of players : 1
Planned supported platforms : Steam / Nintendo Switch / PS4
Release Date : TBD

[Staff]
Scenario, Direction : Keika Hanada
Art Direction : Kanemune
Lead Program : Tattoo
Music : Yusuke Tsutsumi, tetem. And more.
Background Art : Lim ChinYang

[Teaser Web]
https://novect.net/m_en/

#M #NOVECT #Novectacle #Detective #Mystery #Adventure #Indie #Indiegame
